5#ifndef V8_COMMON_PTR_COMPR_H_
6#define V8_COMMON_PTR_COMPR_H_
7
8#include "src/base/memory.h"
9#include "src/common/globals.h"
10
11namespace v8::internal {
12
13// This is just a collection of common compression scheme related functions.
14// Each pointer compression cage then has its own compression scheme, which
15// mainly differes in the cage base address they use.
16template <typename Cage>
17class V8HeapCompressionSchemeImpl {
18 public:
19 V8_INLINE static Address GetPtrComprCageBaseAddress(Address on_heap_addr);
20
21 V8_INLINE static Address GetPtrComprCageBaseAddress(
22 PtrComprCageBase cage_base);
23
24 // Compresses full-pointer representation of a tagged value to on-heap
25 // representation.
26 // Must only be used for compressing object pointers since this function
27 // assumes that we deal with a valid address inside the pointer compression
28 // cage.
29 V8_INLINE static Tagged_t CompressObject(Address tagged);
30 // Compress a potentially invalid pointer.
31 V8_INLINE static Tagged_t CompressAny(Address tagged);
32
33 // Decompresses smi value.
34 V8_INLINE static Address DecompressTaggedSigned(Tagged_t raw_value);
35
36 // Decompresses any tagged value, preserving both weak- and smi- tags.
37 template <typename TOnHeapAddress>
38 V8_INLINE static Address DecompressTagged(TOnHeapAddress on_heap_addr,
39 Tagged_t raw_value);
40
41 // Given a 64bit raw value, found on the stack, calls the callback function
42 // with all possible pointers that may be "contained" in compressed form in
43 // this value, either as complete compressed pointers or as intermediate
44 // (half-computed) results.
45 template <typename ProcessPointerCallback>
46 V8_INLINE static void ProcessIntermediatePointers(
47 PtrComprCageBase cage_base, Address raw_value,
48 ProcessPointerCallback callback);
49
50 // Process-wide cage base value used for decompression.
51 V8_INLINE static void InitBase(Address base);
52 V8_CONST V8_INLINE static Address base();
53};
54
55// The main pointer compression cage, used for most objects.
56class MainCage : public AllStatic {
57 friend class V8HeapCompressionSchemeImpl<MainCage>;
58
59 // These non-inlined accessors to base_ field are used in component builds
60 // where cross-component access to thread local variables is not allowed.
61 static V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE Address base_non_inlined();
62 static V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE void set_base_non_inlined(Address base);
63
64#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS_IN_SHARED_CAGE
65 static V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE uintptr_t base_ V8_CONSTINIT;
66#else
67 static thread_local uintptr_t base_ V8_CONSTINIT;
68#endif // V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS_IN_SHARED_CAGE
69};
70using V8HeapCompressionScheme = V8HeapCompressionSchemeImpl<MainCage>;
71
72#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
73// Compression scheme used for compressed pointers between trusted objects in
74// the trusted heap space, outside of the sandbox.
75class TrustedCage : public AllStatic {
76 friend class V8HeapCompressionSchemeImpl<TrustedCage>;
77
78 // The TrustedCage is only used in the shared cage build configuration, so
79 // there is no need for a thread_local version.
80 static V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE uintptr_t base_ V8_CONSTINIT;
81};
82using TrustedSpaceCompressionScheme = V8HeapCompressionSchemeImpl<TrustedCage>;
83#else
84// The trusted cage does not exist in this case.
85using TrustedSpaceCompressionScheme = V8HeapCompressionScheme;
86#endif // V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
87
88// A compression scheme which can be passed if the only objects we ever expect
89// to see are Smis (e.g. for {TaggedField<Smi, 0, SmiCompressionScheme>}).
90class SmiCompressionScheme : public AllStatic {
91 public:
92 static Address DecompressTaggedSigned(Tagged_t raw_value) {
93 // For runtime code the upper 32-bits of the Smi value do not matter.
94 return static_cast<Address>(raw_value);
95 }
96
97 static Tagged_t CompressObject(Address tagged) {
98 V8_ASSUME(HAS_SMI_TAG(tagged));
99 return static_cast<Tagged_t>(tagged);
100 }
101};
102
103#ifdef V8_EXTERNAL_CODE_SPACE
104// Compression scheme used for fields containing InstructionStream objects
105// (namely for the Code::code field). Same as
106// V8HeapCompressionScheme but with a different base value.
107// TODO(ishell): consider also using V8HeapCompressionSchemeImpl here unless
108// this becomes a different compression scheme that allows crossing the 4GB
109// boundary.
110class ExternalCodeCompressionScheme {
111 public:
112 V8_INLINE static Address PrepareCageBaseAddress(Address on_heap_addr);
113
114 // Note that this compression scheme doesn't allow reconstruction of the cage
115 // base value from any arbitrary value, thus the cage base has to be passed
116 // explicitly to the decompression functions.
117 static Address GetPtrComprCageBaseAddress(Address on_heap_addr) = delete;
118
119 V8_INLINE static Address GetPtrComprCageBaseAddress(
120 PtrComprCageBase cage_base);
121
122 // Compresses full-pointer representation of a tagged value to on-heap
123 // representation.
124 // Must only be used for compressing object pointers (incl. SMI) since this
125 // function assumes pointers to be inside the pointer compression cage.
126 V8_INLINE static Tagged_t CompressObject(Address tagged);
127 // Compress anything that does not follow the above requirements (e.g. a maybe
128 // object, or a marker bit pattern).
129 V8_INLINE static Tagged_t CompressAny(Address tagged);
130
131 // Decompresses smi value.
132 V8_INLINE static Address DecompressTaggedSigned(Tagged_t raw_value);
133
134 // Decompresses any tagged value, preserving both weak- and smi- tags.
135 template <typename TOnHeapAddress>
136 V8_INLINE static Address DecompressTagged(TOnHeapAddress on_heap_addr,
137 Tagged_t raw_value);
138
139 // Process-wide cage base value used for decompression.
140 V8_INLINE static void InitBase(Address base);
141 V8_INLINE static Address base();
142
143 private:
144 // These non-inlined accessors to base_ field are used in component builds
145 // where cross-component access to thread local variables is not allowed.
146 static Address base_non_inlined();
147 static void set_base_non_inlined(Address base);
148
149#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS_IN_SHARED_CAGE
150 static V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE uintptr_t base_ V8_CONSTINIT;
151#else
152 static thread_local uintptr_t base_ V8_CONSTINIT;
153#endif // V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS_IN_SHARED_CAGE
154};
155
156#endif // V8_EXTERNAL_CODE_SPACE
157
158// Accessors for fields that may be unaligned due to pointer compression.
159
160template <typename V>
161static inline V ReadMaybeUnalignedValue(Address p) {
162 // Pointer compression causes types larger than kTaggedSize to be unaligned.
163#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
164 constexpr bool v8_pointer_compression_unaligned = sizeof(V) > kTaggedSize;
165#else
166 constexpr bool v8_pointer_compression_unaligned = false;
167#endif
168 // Bug(v8:8875) Double fields may be unaligned.
169 constexpr bool unaligned_double_field =
170 std::is_same<V, double>::value && kDoubleSize > kTaggedSize;
171 if (unaligned_double_field || v8_pointer_compression_unaligned) {
172 return base::ReadUnalignedValue<V>(p);
173 } else {
174 return base::Memory<V>(p);
175 }
176}
177
178template <typename V>
179static inline void WriteMaybeUnalignedValue(Address p, V value) {
180 // Pointer compression causes types larger than kTaggedSize to be unaligned.
181#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
182 constexpr bool v8_pointer_compression_unaligned = sizeof(V) > kTaggedSize;
183#else
184 constexpr bool v8_pointer_compression_unaligned = false;
185#endif
186 // Bug(v8:8875) Double fields may be unaligned.
187 constexpr bool unaligned_double_field =
188 std::is_same<V, double>::value && kDoubleSize > kTaggedSize;
189 if (unaligned_double_field || v8_pointer_compression_unaligned) {
190 base::WriteUnalignedValue<V>(p, value);
191 } else {
192 base::Memory<V>(p) = value;
193 }
194}
195
196// When multi-cage pointer compression mode is enabled this scope object
197// saves current cage's base values and sets them according to given Isolate.
198// For all other configurations this scope object is a no-op.
199class PtrComprCageAccessScope final {
200 public:
201#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS_IN_MULTIPLE_CAGES
202 V8_INLINE explicit PtrComprCageAccessScope(Isolate* isolate);
203 V8_INLINE ~PtrComprCageAccessScope();
204#else
205 V8_INLINE explicit PtrComprCageAccessScope(Isolate* isolate) {}
206 V8_INLINE ~PtrComprCageAccessScope() {}
207#endif
208
209 private:
210#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS_IN_MULTIPLE_CAGES
211 const Address cage_base_;
212#ifdef V8_EXTERNAL_CODE_SPACE
213// In case this configuration is necessary the code cage base must be saved too.
214#error Multi-cage pointer compression with external code space is not supported
215#endif // V8_EXTERNAL_CODE_SPACE
216#endif // V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS_IN_MULTIPLE_CAGES
217};
218
219} // namespace v8::internal
220
221#endif // V8_COMMON_PTR_COMPR_H_
